'''Hydro Mimic Boars''' are [[Hydro Mimics]] summoned by the [[Rhodeia of Loch|Oceanid]], but can also be encountered on their own in the [[Spiral Abyss]] or during [[Quests]]. They resemble normal [[Forest Boar]]s.

==Abilities==
''Most ability names are unofficial.''
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Mimic Boar

|name_1 = Heal
|desc_1 = Every 1.5 seconds, heals itself for '''5%''' of its Max [[HP]]. The healing will be disabled for 3 seconds after being hit by a {{Pyro}} attack.

|name_2 = Ram
|desc_2 = When up close, quickly rams at the player, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}} on hit.

|name_3 = Charge
|desc_3 = When far from the player, charges straight ahead at the player, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}} on hit.

|name_4 = Splash
|desc_4 = This attack is exclusive to the special variant. Launches a splash of water at the player, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}}.
}}
